name: substrait
description: Utilities for working with Substrait plans in Javascript projects

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run clean-proto && npm run proto && npm run transpileProto && npm run make-dist && npm run transpile
scripts.clean-proto: rimraf src/generated && mkdirp src/generated && mkdirp dist/generated
scripts.proto: pbjs -w scripts/wrapper.js --target static-module --path substrait-spec/proto -o dist/generated/definitions.js substrait/plan.proto
scripts.prepare: npm run clean-proto && npm run proto && npm run transpileProto
